welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lordelo do Ouro, Portugal! Get ready to experience the charming city known for its beautiful architecture, delicious food, and warm hospitality. Enjoy your stay and explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the ANAM Wifi network and follow the instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
